mapper.insert: insert into administrator (admin_id, admin_name, age, gender, a_login, a_pwd, a_phone, e_mial) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{aLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eMial,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update administrator set admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, a_login = #{aLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_pwd = #{aPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_phone = #{aPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_mial = #{eMial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_name, age, gender, a_login, a_pwd, a_phone, e_mial from administrator
